name: Ancient Combat Bracer

items.alias: Ancient Scrap of Saturated Spirit Knowledge
Ancient Scrap of Condensed Spirit Knowledge
Ancient Scrap of Spirit Combat Knowledge

raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Crystalised Memories of a Sniper" "267704" #L "Crystalised Memories of a Warrior" "267697" #L "Ancient Scrap of Spirit Knowledge" "267677" #L "Ancient Scrap of Saturated Spirit Knowledge" "267679" #L "Inert Knowledge Crystal" "267737" #L "Inactive Ancient Bracer" "267746" #L "Ancient Engineering Device" "267751" (Reusable) #L "Recipe" "/tell recipe 594" #L "Crystalised Memories of a Defender" "267711" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Crystalised Memories of a Sniper + Crystalised Memories of a Warrior = #L "Combined Crystalised Combat Memories" "267705" Skills: | NP1250 | ------------------------------ Ancient Scrap of Spirit Knowledge + Ancient Scrap of Saturated Spirit Knowledge = #L "Ancient Scrap of Condensed Spirit Knowledge" "267680" Skills: | PT1750 | ------------------------------ Combined Crystalised Combat Memories + Ancient Scrap of Condensed Spirit Knowledge = #L "Ancient Scrap of Spirit Combat Knowledge" "267681" Skills: | CL1250 | ------------------------------ Ancient Scrap of Spirit Combat Knowledge + Inert Knowledge Crystal = #L "Combat Knowledge Crystal" "267739" Skills: | PT1750 | ------------------------------ Inactive Bracer + Ancient Engineering Device = #L "Active Ancient Bracer" "267747" Skills: | ME1500 | ------------------------------ Active Ancient Bracer + Combat Knowledge Crystal = #L "Ancient Combat Bracer" "267753" Skills: | CL1250 | ------------------------------ You can now modify your Ancient Combat bracer with a Crystalised Memory. The result will depend on which Memory you use: ------------------------------ Variation 1: Ancient Combat Bracer + Crystalised Memories of a Sniper = #L "Modified Ancient Combat Bracer" "267756" Skills: | CL1250 | Variation 2: Ancient Combat Bracer + Crystalised Memories of a Warrior = #L "Modified Ancient Combat Bracer" "267757" Skills: | CL1250 | Variation 3: Ancient Combat Bracer + Crystalised Memories of a Defender = #L "Modified Ancient Combat Bracer" "267755" Skills: | CL1250 | ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ You can further upgrade this item, but thats another recipe... #L "Click here" "/tell recipe 596" to see it.
